items.tip: Major Courage is a buff and increases weapon damage and spell damage. Increases Weapon Damage and Spell Damage by 430. E.g. Spell Power Cure Set
Minor Courage is a buff and increases weapon damage and spell damage. Increases Weapon Damage and Spell Damage by 215. E.g. Claw of Yolnahkriin Set, Zenas' Empowering Disc Skill or via Scribing
Powerful Assault is an armor set in the Elder Scrolls Online that can be obtained in Imperial Sewers. It is part of the Imperial City DLC pack.
Pearlescent Ward is an armor set in the Elder Scrolls Online that can be obtained in Dreadsail Reef. It is part of the High Isle DLC pack.
